categories: Category:Star Wars: A New Hope - The Special Edition

nodes.text: Star Wars: A New Hope - The Special Edition 2
Star Wars: A New Hope - The Special Edition 2 was the second issue in the Star Wars: A New Hope - The Special Edition series of comics. It was released February 5, 1997.

This all-new adaptation of Star Wars: A New Hope—The Special Edition features the outstanding creative team of Bruce Jones, Eduardo Barreto, and Al Williamson, with painted covers by Dave Dorman. Like the Special Edition of the motion picture, this comics series will take you back to a place you've never been before! Experience it again, for the very first time.
